description: Describes a specific delete inventory operation.

nested_items.name: InventoryDeletions
nested_items.description: A list of status items for deleted inventory.

nested_items.name: DeletionId
nested_items.description: The deletion ID returned by the DeleteInventory operation.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the inventory data type.

nested_items.name: DeletionStartTime
nested_items.description: The UTC timestamp when the delete operation started.

nested_items.name: LastStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the operation. Possible values are InProgress and Complete.

nested_items.name: DeletionSummary
nested_items.description: Information about the delete operation. For more information about this summary, see Understanding the delete inventory summary in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of items to delete. This count doesn't change during the delete operation.

nested_items.name: RemainingCount
nested_items.description: Remaining number of items to delete.

nested_items.name: SummaryItems
nested_items.description: A list of counts and versions for deleted items.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: A count of the number of deleted items.

nested_items.name: RemainingCount
nested_items.description: The remaining number of items to delete.

nested_items.name: LastStatusUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The UTC timestamp of when the last status report.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
